controllers

Class TweetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.TweetController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class TweetController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This controller contains multiple action methods to handle HTTP requests to the application's Tweet's page.
    Author:
    raghav

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TweetController(play.data.FormFactory formFactory)
      Constructor intializes the form ,list of tweets , Twitter instance by setting the configuration for authorization for twitter api.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> clearAll()
      Clears all the tweets from the list asynchronously using CompletableFuture.supplyAsync method
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> fetchTweets()
      Fetch the tweets from twitter api asynchronously by calling querApi on a different thread using CompletableFuture.supplyAsync method and then redirects the fetched results to template listtweets using CompletableFuture.thenApply
      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> getUser(java.lang.String screenName)
      Takes the user screenname and fetch the user object and list of tweets for that user asynchronously
      play.mvc.Result listTweets()
      Action method calls the view template listtweets and render the list of tweets and form to listtweets.

      • TweetController

        @Inject
public TweetController(play.data.FormFactory formFactory)

    • Method Detail

      • listTweets

        public play.mvc.Result listTweets()
        Action method calls the view template listtweets and render the list of tweets and form to listtweets.
        Returns:
        returns a play.mvc.Result value, representing the HTTP response to send to the client

      • fetchTweets

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> fetchTweets()
        Fetch the tweets from twitter api asynchronously by calling querApi on a different thread using CompletableFuture.supplyAsync method and then redirects the fetched results to template listtweets using CompletableFuture.thenApply
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture of type Result

      • getUser

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> getUser(java.lang.String screenName)
        Takes the user screenname and fetch the user object and list of tweets for that user asynchronously
        Parameters:
        screenName - the users screenname
        Returns:
        user's profile and its recent posts as a completable future of type Result

      • clearAll

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> clearAll()
        Clears all the tweets from the list asynchronously using CompletableFuture.supplyAsync method
        Returns:
        returns a CompletionStage Result value, representing the HTTP response to send to the client
